pages.text: Creating a $(l:blocks/coalstone_furnace)Coalstone Furnace$(/l) will allow you to increase your total smelting efficiency by about 1.5x.$(br2)The Coalstone Furnace can be made with $(l:blocks/coalstone_bricks)Coalstone Bricks$(/l) or $(l:blocks/coalstone_tiles)Tiles$(/l) interchangeably and has two recipes - one from scratch, and one that includes a regular Furnace.
